achievements.description: Escape the apartment block raid.
achievements.name: Malcontent

achievements.description: Break the mini-teleporter in Kleiner's lab.
achievements.name: What cat?

achievements.description: Get the crowbar.
achievements.name: Trusty Hardware

achievements.description: Kill five barnacles with one barrel.
achievements.name: Barnacle Bowling

achievements.description: Get the airboat.
achievements.name: Anchor's Aweigh!

achievements.description: Get the airboat's mounted gun.
achievements.name: Heavy Weapons

achievements.description: Discover the hidden singing vortigaunt cave in chapter Water Hazard.
achievements.name: Vorticough

achievements.description: Destroy the hunter-chopper in Half-Life 2.
achievements.name: Revenge!

achievements.description: Find the HEV Suit Charger faceplate in Eli's scrapyard.
achievements.name: Blast from the Past

achievements.description: Get the Gravity Gun in Black Mesa East.
achievements.name: Zero-Point Energy

achievements.description: Use DOG's ball to make a basket in Eli's scrapyard.
achievements.name: Two Points

achievements.description: Play through Ravenholm using only the Gravity Gun.
achievements.name: Zombie Chopper

achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies using the crane.
achievements.name: OSHA Violation

achievements.description: Pin a soldier to the billboard in chapter Highway 17.
achievements.name: Targetted Advertising

achievements.description: Destroy six gunships in Half-Life 2.
achievements.name: One Man Army

achievements.description: Cross the antlion beach in chapter Sandtraps without touching the sand.
achievements.name: Keep Off the Sand!

achievements.description: Use the antlions to kill 50 enemies.
achievements.name: Bug Hunt

achievements.description: Kill an enemy with a toilet.
achievements.name: Flushed

achievements.description: Survive the second turret standoff in Nova Prospekt.
achievements.name: Warden Freeman

achievements.description: Gain command of a squad of rebels in the uprising.
achievements.name: Follow Freeman

achievements.description: Get through the toxic tunnel under City 17 in Half-Life 2.
achievements.name: Radiation Levels Detected

achievements.description: Survive the generator plaza standoff in chapter Anticitizen One.
achievements.name: Plaza Defender

achievements.description: Kill all of the snipers in City 17.
achievements.name: Counter-Sniper

achievements.description: Shut down the supression device by disabling its generators.
achievements.name: Fight the Power

achievements.description: Survive the rooftop strider battle in the ruins of City 17.
achievements.name: Giant Killer

achievements.description: Disintegrate 15 soldiers by throwing them into a Combine ball field.
achievements.name: Atomizer

achievements.description: Find all lambda caches in Half-Life 2.
achievements.name: Lambda Locator

achievements.description: Kill five enemies with a Manhack.
achievements.name: Hack Attack!

achievements.description: Make it to the bottom of the Citadel's main elevator shaft in one piece.
achievements.name: Watch Your Head!

achievements.description: Contain the Citadel core.
achievements.name: Containment

achievements.description: Contain the Citadel core without killing any stalkers.
achievements.name: Pacifist

achievements.description: Use the cars to squash 15 antlions in Episode One.
achievements.name: Car Crusher

achievements.description: Survive long enough to get on the parking garage elevator.
achievements.name: Elevator Action

achievements.description: Help Alyx snipe 30 enemies in Episode One.
achievements.name: Live Bait

achievements.description: Destroy the gunship in the hospital attic.
achievements.name: Attica!

achievements.description: Don't let any citizens die when escorting them to the escape train.
achievements.name: Citizen Escort

achievements.description: Escape City 17 with Alyx.
achievements.name: Escape From City 17

achievements.description: Finish the game firing exactly one bullet. Grenade, crowbar, rocket, and Gravity Gun kills are okay!
achievements.name: The One Free Bullet

achievements.description: Kill five enemies with the same energy ball.
achievements.name: Conservationist

achievements.description: Kill an Elite Soldier with his own energy ball.
achievements.name: Think Fast!

achievements.description: Use flares to light 15 zombies on fire.
achievements.name: Zombie-que

achievements.description: Kill an acid antlion worker.
achievements.name: Acid Reflex

achievements.description: Squish every antlion grub in Episode Two.
achievements.name: Get Some Grub

achievements.description: Find and break every web cache in Episode Two.
achievements.name: Piñata Party

achievements.description: Help Griggs and Sheckley hold off the antlion invasion inside the mine shaft.
achievements.name: Into the Breach

achievements.description: Defeat both antlion guards outside the White Forest.
achievements.name: Twofer

achievements.description: Run over 20 enemies with the car in Episode Two.
achievements.name: Hit and Run

achievements.description: Survive the Hunter ambush with Alyx.
achievements.name: Meet the Hunters

achievements.description: Defeat the chopper in Episode Two without any misses.
achievements.name: Puttin' On a Clinic

achievements.description: Destroy the Combine Autogun in the junkyard.
achievements.name: Gunishment!

achievements.description: Find every radar cache in chapter Under The Radar.
achievements.name: Cache Checker

achievements.description: Beat DOG in a race to the White Forest base.
achievements.name: Pedal to the Metal

achievements.description: Unlock the rocket launcher lambda cache in chapter Under The Radar.
achievements.name: Gordon Propelled Rocket

achievements.description: Survive the ambush at White Forest Inn.
achievements.name: Quiet Mountain Getaway

achievements.description: Send the garden gnome into space.
achievements.name: Little Rocket Man

achievements.description: Secure the launch doors on missile silo 2.
achievements.name: Secondary Silo Secured

achievements.description: Save all buildings outside the missile silo from destruction.
achievements.name: Neighborhood Watch

achievements.description: Save the missile silo from the Combine offensive.
achievements.name: Defense of the Armament

achievements.description: Kill a Hunter with its own flechettes.
achievements.name: Payback

achievements.description: Kill 30 enemies with thrown physics objects.
achievements.name: Bone Breaker

achievements.description: Kill an enemy by planting a hopper mine.
achievements.name: Deadly Harvest

achievements.description: Kill a Combine soldier with his own grenade.
achievements.name: Hot Potat0wned

achievements.description: Steal a Zombine's grenade.
achievements.name: Grave Robber

achievements.description: If you are reading this achievement, Gabe Newell has successfully launched Gnome Chompski into space. If you did not also receive the achievement 'Manufacturing Ascent', Newell has abandoned his plans to shoot Noam Chomsky into space.
achievements.name: Gnome Alone

achievements.name: Friendly
